summary: REQ-22 appears implemented via updates to frontend/index.html adding canonical and social metadata for https://beyhubx.com. REQ-21 is only partially addressed: a client-side redirect script was added, but there is no evidence in the diff of deployment/DNS/hosting configuration to make https://beyhubx.com reachable as the primary domain.

missing_requirements.requirement: Configure the deployed site to use the custom domain "beyhubx.com" as the primary website URL (app reachable at https://beyhubx.com/; old domain redirects to https://beyhubx.com/ preserving path and hash).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a frontend client-side redirect script, but does not show any deployment/hosting configuration (e.g., custom domain binding, DNS, gateway/ingress, or platform config) that would make https://beyhubx.com/ actually serve the app. The acceptance criteria requires the app to be reachable at that URL, which cannot be verified/implemented solely by the shown HTML changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend changes implementing/expanding user profile management, team/icon/video/mail-related logic (unrelated to custom domain change).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly focuses on custom domain configuration and frontend head metadata; it also states not to change backend APIs or data models solely for the domain change. The diff shows substantial backend edits not requested for domain setup.

hallucinated_features.description: Project documentation/state updates describing new app features (inbox, team footage uploads, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest, which is limited to domain + metadata updates.
